body:
So after closely comparing my code to the code in the github repository used by the Microsoft documentation I discovered they have a file called appsettings.Development.json in the Client/wwwroot folder, which is used to provide a URL prefix to the Client app so it can access the Api project locally. This prefix is then prepended to the BaseAddress in Program.cs.

The frustrating part is that the documentation completely omits this and provides no indication that this is a necessary step.

I'm posting this here in case anyone else comes across the same problem.
